JOIN THE MOVEMENT

APRIL 19-21, 2013 | 500 7TH AVE, 17TH FLOOR

The International Space Apps Challenge is a technology development and problem solving event during which citizens from around the world collaborate to tackle challenges relevant to improving life on Earth and the exploration of space.
Join us in over 75 cities around the world... or at home!

Organized by the New York Technology Council, StartupBus NYC and AlleyNYC.
